title: Gismart Piano
summary: No ads! All songs unlocked! The Real Piano in your pocket!
description: The only realistic piano and musical instruments learning app with free songs made by musicians for musicians and beginners!Download right now and learn to play the piano keyboard on your Phone or Tablet for free!Our digital Piano app lets you choose sounds from a number of music instruments: from a grand and fortepiano, to the violin, harpsichord, accordion, organ and guitar. Carve out original melodies and record them to play back via different musical instruments. You’ll learn various chords and how to read sheet music, taking you on your journey to become a virtual piano player and maestro!★★★ Real Piano app features ★★★✔ Full 88 key piano keyboard✔ Fun Mode✔ 9 Different piano keyboards and musical instruments:Piano keyboardGrand Piano keyboardOrganHarpsichordAccordion keyboardElectric GuitarHarpCello PizzicatoVintage piano✔ Single or Dual scrollable keyboard✔ Free piano songs✔ Popular and classic piano songs✔ Piano record feature - record and share your plays✔ Piano HD=== About Gismart ===Gismart is a team of devoted musicians and developers with real passion for music and everything about it!Find out more about us: Gismart.com Follow us on Twitter/Facebook: @GismartmusicFeel free to drop us a line about anything: info@gismart.comThe Piano for your device !
descriptionHTML:
The only realistic piano and musical instruments learning app with free songs made by musicians for musicians and beginners!
Download right now and learn to play the piano keyboard on your Phone or Tablet for free!

Our digital Piano app lets you choose sounds from a number of music instruments: from a grand and fortepiano, to the violin, harpsichord, accordion, organ and guitar. Carve out original melodies and record them to play back via different musical instruments. You’ll learn various chords and how to read sheet music, taking you on your journey to become a virtual piano player and maestro!

★★★ Real Piano app features ★★★
✔ Full 88 key piano keyboard
✔ Fun Mode
✔ 9 Different piano keyboards and musical instruments:
Piano keyboard
Grand Piano keyboard
Organ
Harpsichord
Accordion keyboard
Electric Guitar
Harp
Cello Pizzicato
Vintage piano
✔ Single or Dual scrollable keyboard
✔ Free piano songs
✔ Popular and classic piano songs
✔ Piano record feature - record and share your plays
✔ Piano HD



=== About Gismart ===
Gismart is a team of devoted musicians and developers with real passion for music and everything about it!
Find out more about us: Gismart.com
Follow us on Twitter/Facebook: @Gismartmusic
Feel free to drop us a line about anything: info@gismart.com
The Piano for your device !
comments: I loved this musical fun app, it highly enjoyable! I wonder if more songs can be added to the music selections? You sent a rating request when I already rated your app! I won't change my five star rating but I will if you keep annoying me!!
First the keys kept stuck when you press them (after which you can't press them anymore) and now I can only do 1 key at the time after the update. Horrible app, not worth any money at all. Rubbish.
I can't press more than 2 keys at the same time. Small Song collection. Sorry I can't give you 5 stars
It keeps makeing me rate it there's barely any songs DONT GET
Easy and enjoy to play.. please make your piano  setting the clock alarm with option some  song... perpect!!!
Thuis is a very gold app. Really fun way to learn the basics playing piano. Would definitely recommend, even for just good fun :)
recentChanges: - The app is now localized into French, Spanish, German, Italian, Arabic, Russian, Portuguese
- Performance improvements and minor bug fixes
